text: [In podosi ʙuzurg dar] Ruzest, ki mardonu zanoni mu'minro menigari, ki nurason pesi ru va dar samti rostason ʙa sitoʙ harakat mekunad [va ʙa onon xitoʙ mesavad]: «Imruz ʙasorati ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] ʙar sumo ʙod, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast va covidona dar on ʙa sar xohed ʙurd. In ast hamon komjoʙii ʙuzurg»
